nodes.text: I think it makes it clear that it is not necessarily true that an all-good God would have to create a world in which there is no harm.
it's also possible as the Christian believes that there's an afterlife in which God will compensate us for the harms that we have borne if we have borne these in courage faith and trust in Him.
Every immoral act will be punished.
In order reward and punishment to exist it is necessary harm to exist
